synopsis.text: Himawari and Hayato find themselves embroiled in more hilarious ninja misadventures in this sequel series. Aspiring kunoichi Himawari continues her ninja training, while also trying to uncover secrets from her mysterious past and the identity of the ninja who once saved her. However, their peaceful days at ninja school are suddenly disrupted when the neighboring all-boys academy is destroyed and its students vanish. Soon after, Himawari and her friends become targets of bizarre attacks from unknown assailants. Are these events connected? As the chaos unfolds, enigmatic teacher Takechi-sensei appears to be at the center of the mystery. To get to the bottom of things and protect their village, Himawari, Hayato, and their quirky band of kunoichis must band together. Through their amusing antics and valiant teamwork, the plucky ninjas-in-training just may be able to defeat their foes and solve the puzzle of the disappearing students. But who is orchestrating these strange events, and why were Himawari and her comrades singled out? The answers promise to reveal secrets that will impact her future in unexpected ways.
